channel.title: HEAs/MEAs on Atsuya Watanabe's Personal Web-site
channel.description: Recent content in HEAs/MEAs on Atsuya Watanabe's Personal Web-site

item.description: New paper has been published on JALCOM! Fabrication of FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy nanoparticles by high-repetition-rate UV picosecond laser ablation in water Atsuya Watanabe, Tomoyuki Yatsuhashi Journal of Alloys and Compounds 950, 169896. 10.1016/j.jallcom.2023.169896

New paper has been published on MST Microstructure and tensile strength of electrodeposited Fe-rich bcc FeCoNi medium-entropy alloys A. Watanabe, T. Yamamoto, R. Miyamoto, and Y. Takigawa Materials Science and Technology (in press). 10.1080/02670836.2023.2187973

item.title: Excellence in Reviewing
item.description: Excellence in Reviewing My reviewing in Heliyon was awarded “Excellence in Reviewing”. Certificate of Excellence in Reviewing presented to ATSUYA WATANABE in recognition of the excellent quality of peer review contributed to the journal.
